generated_body: The article is likely to discuss initiatives aimed at helping veterans transition into entrepreneurship by launching their own startups. It may explore the unique resilience and skills that veterans bring to business ownership, highlighting successful examples and support programs available to them. The piece could also touch on the challenges veterans face in this journey and how various organizations are addressing these issues. Overall, readers might expect insights into both the personal experiences of veteran entrepreneurs and the resources that can facilitate their success.
